content: long tail elf hat i ve been making these freehand for a while and finally decided to write it down as i went so i could share the pattern with others this pattern has not been tested worked in the round do not join abreviations chain - chain st - stitch single_crochet - single_crochet half_double_crochet - half_double_crochet increase - increase rsc - reverse single_crochet materials 5mm hook any yarn scrap works great if it is a thin yarn double strand would work better i like to mix in fuzzy and fun fur yarns for texture scissors stitch marker needle for weaving in ends 1 chain 3 join to make loop single_crochet 6 into loop 2 single_crochet half_double_crochet 5 6st 3-4 half_double_crochet 6 5 half_double_crochet increase half_double_crochet 9st 6-8 half_double_crochet 9 around 9 half_double_crochet increase half_double_crochet 2 12st 10-12 half_double_crochet around 13 half_double_crochet increase half_double_crochet 3 15st 14-16 half_double_crochet around 17 half_double_crochet increase half_double_crochet 4 18st 18-20 half_double_crochet around 21 half_double_crochet increase half_double_crochet 2 24st 22-24 half_double_crochet around 25 half_double_crochet increase half_double_crochet 3 30st 26-28 half_double_crochet around 29 half_double_crochet increase half_double_crochet 4 36st 30-32 half_double_crochet around 33 half_double_crochet increase half_double_crochet 5 42st 34-36 half_double_crochet around 37 half_double_crochet increase half_double_crochet 6 48st 38-40 half_double_crochet around 41 half_double_crochet increase half_double_crochet 7 54st 42-44 half_double_crochet around 45 half_double_crochet increase half_double_crochet 8 60st 46-48 half_double_crochet around 49 half_double_crochet increase half_double_crochet 9 66st 50-59 half_double_crochet around 10 rounds of 66st 60 single_crochet around 66st 61 finishing round you can finish in any way you like i like to do one of the three following ways - 1 rsc/crab stitch - i like to turn the hat so i am working backwards but still in the same direction as before just from the wrong back side rsc is worked as a single_crochet but in reverse 2 one round of popcorn - work 5dc in the same st drop the loop from your hook insert your hook into the first of the 5dc grab the dropped loop and pull it through with your hook i like to separate each popcor stitch with a single_crochet 3 another round of single_crochet slip_stitch to join at end of round 61 fasten_off and weave in end make tassel or pompom if desired and sew to top point of hat if using fun fur or fuzzy yarn that makes counting stitches harder i try to keep it to the non-increase rounds sometimes i will just extend the number of non-increase rounds until i am to the end of the fuzzy/furry yarn this pattern is for an average adult size but can easily be adjusted bigger or smaller by adding or subtracting increase rounds you could also make it smaller by using a smaller hook
